mapper.insert: insert into user (username, password, nickname, age, gender, phone, email, vip, avatar, used_space, total_space, register_time, last_login_time, status) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{vip}, #{avatar}, #{usedSpace}, #{totalSpace}, #{registerTime}, #{lastLoginTime}, #{status})
mapper.select: select * from user where username = #{username} limit 1
